Title: Requires publishers of books created with the use of generative artificial intelligence to contain a disclosure of such use
Summary: Requires publishers of books created wholly or partially with the use of generative artificial intelligence to disclose such use of generative artificial intelligence before the completion of such sale; applies to all printed and digital books consisting of text, pictures, audio, puzzles, games or any combination thereof.
LawCode: Add ยง338, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring publishers of books created with the use of generative artificial intelligence to contain a disclosure of such use
